title: C++ Level 2 â€” Data Types, Variables & Operators
intro: This level focuses on declaring variables, using different data types, and working with operators.
points: Declare variables of types int, long long, float, double, char, and bool.
Initialize variables and understand default values.
Use arithmetic operators (+, -, *, /, %) and assignment operators.
Apply relational and logical operators in expressions.
Understand operator precedence and the use of parentheses.
